title: people afking in ranked solo q
body: anyone else think its annoying when two people afk in a ranked game? like if you know you have somewhere to be or your parents won't like you being on the game don't play ranked it supper annoying

replies.body: So just remember that internet accidents happen and it can go down for seemingly no reason. I know it's annoying when people afk in ranked games but just tell yourself that it happens to everyone and it isn't just you. This game it's you who has the afk but in the next few games it's the enemy team who has the afk.

more often than not, it's either a blackout or the internet failing them from my experience. Australian's powernetwork isn't exactly reliable and we all know how dodgy our internet can be sometimes, especially when it's a promo series.
you make it sound like we are in some backwater country, i live about 25 mins outside of brisbane, and we havnt had a power outage in years, not even during the floods.

A lot of the suburbs around Brisbane have underground power lines, which pretty much means (barring anything drastic) that unless the actual exchange goes out, we don't lose power. This simply isn't true of a lot of other places where they have above ground power, which ofc means that all it takes to knock out their power for a while is on power line going down. 

Just something to consider before you start saying "it doesn't happen to me therefore it doesn't happen to anyone else". Also, you seem to be implying that 25 mins out of Brisbane is far.... That just ain't so.

In Adelaide, even if you live in the city, it's very rare you go a month without a power outage. There is currently a statewide discussion about improving the SA power network and building backup infrastructure and securing an agreement with the power companies because of the frequency we get statewide blackouts, is a little much. South Australia is a joke.
I live 20 minutes from brisbane and i lost power in the floods. Also from other randome incidents.

oh no im not saying that about people who have serious lag or internet issues i mean the ones that knowingly know they have to go somewhere and then go into a ranked game then halfway through say they have to be somewhere and afk. I completely understand the internet part of it because well its happened to all of us. But it's annoying knowing that people do it well what pretty much feels like on purpose
